fact: Beef contains higher amounts of iron than chicken or fish. Fresh, lean beef is rich in various vitamins and minerals, especially iron and zinc. Therefore, moderate intake of beef can be recommended as part of a healthy diet.
concern:
1. Wash your hands for 20 secs before and after food preparation.
2. Use a seperate cutting board.
3. Clean and sanitize counter tops, cutting boards and utensils before and after food preparation.
